body.name: Ring Rechargeable Battery Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 9 mins
FREE pickup Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 13 hrs 24 mins
features: Get an extra rechargeable battery pack so you'll always have backup power ready to go.

Works with Ring Video Doorbell 2, Video Doorbell 3, Video Doorbell 3 Plus, Video Doorbell 4, Battery Doorbell Plus, Stick Up Cam Battery/Solar (all gens), Stick Up Cam Pro Battery/Solar, Spotlight Cam Battery/Solar, Spotlight Cam Plus Battery/Solar/Wired, Spotlight Cam Pro Battery/Solar/Wired, Peephole Cam, Solar Floodlight.
Includes a quick-release tab to easily change the battery without moving the device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very convenient and efficient. Charges super fast. If you are a Ring user, this charging station is a must-have addition to make sure your devices never run out of power. A great backup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ring Dual Charger
reviews.reviewText: I have five cameras, so having only one battery on the charger wasn't working for me. I bought another battery & this dual charger. Works great! It's easy to slide the batteries in & out, and charges them quick enough. It's nice to always have a charged battery when I need new now. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Give it a few charges
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box this charger quick charged the batteries, but they didn’t hold charge very long. After the first initial time of using it, the batteries held charge for the same amount of time that they would have if you used the orange cord that came with your Ring cams. Great product! Fast charging!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ring Charging Station - A Swift and Smart Power Solution!
reviews.reviewText: The Ring Charging Station for Quick Release Battery Packs has become an indispensable companion for my Ring devices. This charging station showcases the convenience and efficiency that Ring consistently delivers in its products.The quick-release design makes it effortless to swap out drained batteries for fully charged ones, ensuring uninterrupted protection and surveillance. The charging process is swift, and the station's compatibility with Ring's battery packs adds versatility to my home security setup.The compact and sleek design of the charging station fits seamlessly into my charging station area, adding a touch of organization to my tech space. The indicator lights provide a clear status update on each battery's charging progress, allowing for easy monitoring.Whether I'm recharging batteries for my Ring doorbell or spotlight camera, this charging station has streamlined the entire process. It's a 5-star product that delivers on efficiency, compatibility, and design. If you're a Ring user, the Ring Charging Station is a must-have for maintaining the power of your security devices. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This battery was purchased for a solar powered camera and so far recharging very well. Will purchase again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed a Back-up Battery for the Ring Doorbell
reviews.reviewText: Perfect backup for the battery that came with the Ring Doorbell. The original one and the back-up take a long time to charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OEM Ring Battery
reviews.reviewText: Perfect as a replacement or backup battery in your device. After a long string of bad weather and snowy days, my solar panel was unable to keep the battery charged with my current settings. Rather than dial back the settings from how I want them, adding the 2nd battery was the perfect solution in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and long lasting
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install and had no problems since installation of the battery.
As promised by ring... but note that you don't need it. The batteries can be charged directly.
